name: Family Liaison
description: The Family Liaison program is dedicated to providing comprehensive support to families and individuals. Services offered are housing, immigration services, CalFresh, MediCal, and other essential needs. Whether you're seeking general help or more personalized guidance, a liaison is here to support you every step of the way.
